subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Glen Day, a former PGA Tour winner trying to make it through the qualifying school finals for the second time in three years, took a big step Friday with an eight-under-par 64 to share the lead with James Nitties at the halfway point. Day, who won the Heritage in 1999, ran off four birdies over the last six holes.
